channel.title: How do u make it so when u making [tut] with mini box code thing
channel.description: like how do u make it so theres like "code" with a mini box under it?!?!?[flash=200,200][/flash]

item.title: How do u make it so when u making [tut] with mini box code thing
item.dc:creator: @masterp00n masterp00n
item.description:
@masterp00n wrote:

do you mean like this?

step1-start a new topic or poll
step2- type in something
step3- look on the top you will see something like this #
step4-highlight what you have written and click the icon that shows # on the top it will show like B for bold a slant like this / and a u thats under lined and a s thats crossed out like somewhere there you will find the i con that looks like # =]

Read full topic
